name: RequestActivationOverride
description: An EM that allows discoverable External Modules to be requested for activation on a project

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger
<b>URL of survey to redirect to, should be in the form http://REDCap/surveys/?s=abcdefghijk
<b>Project ID containing the cost information for external modules to be displayed to users
<b>Field name of any additional text to be displayed to the user in EM enable modal. This field must be present in the same project specified above.
<b>Enables the custom module field to be displayed as additional text under External Module Cost
